page.title: 08SHEERNESS TIMES-GUARDIAN
page.content: THE SHEERNESS{TIMES-GUARDIAN STARTED UP AS TWO SEPARATE PAPERS {THE TIMES}AND{THE GUARDIAN.THE GUARDIAN CAME OUT ON JANUARY 16TH 1858 PRICED AT ONE PENNY.{THE TIMES}CAME OUT IN FEBRUARY 1868.THEY JOINED TOGETHER IN 1939. THE CIRCULATION IS OVER 30,000 A WEEK SOLD MAINLY ON THE ISLAND.THE PAPER EMPLOYS 55 PEOPLE. THE{TIMES-GUARDIAN}SPONSORS THE CHRISTMAS LIGHTS IN DECEMBER.THEY ALSO TAKE PICTURES OF THE LOCAL BABY SHOW. CUPS ARE GIVEN BY THE{TIMES-GUARDIAN - FOR EXAMPLE FOR FOOTBALL MATCHES. THE{TIMES-GUARDIAN}HAS 36 PAGES WHICH CONSIST OF 14 NEWS PAGES,13 COMMERCIAL,4 LEISURE AND 5 PAGES OF ADVERTISEMENTS.
